title: Understanding and Practicing Palliative Care: Online Educational Module

context.prior_knowledge: General understanding of healthcare systems and basic health management
context.additional_context: Blended education for working professionals combining online modules with offline discussion sessions to enhance real-world applicability

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more aspects of palliative care, including its definition, purpose, and benefits
Learners can analyze the impact of palliative care on physical, emotional, social, and spiritual support based on case studies
Learners practice communication skills to effectively convey palliative care-related information in daily life
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
